requirements.description: The Customer is responsible for the legality, accuracy, and quality of their data.
The Customer must ensure that their collection, submission, processing, storage, and transmission of data using Amplitude Services comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
The Customer must also ensure compliance with any privacy policies, agreements, or other obligations they have with their end users.

type.summary: Compliance with Privacy Policies and Agreements

requirements.description: This includes obtaining all legally required consents and permissions.
